genre_description: A Wuxia-inspired fantasy focusing on martial arts philosophy, humility, and spiritual mentorship, featuring supernatural elements like talismanic magic and an ensouled inkstone.

ai_characters.name: An Qinyi
ai_characters.description: A bell-clear voice residing within So Chan's inkstone, acting as a guide, teacher of rhythm and ethics, and strategic advisor.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic social advice to help So Chan navigate a tense confrontation with Chiu without violence.
behaviors.quote: Qinyi—the quiet voice in the inkstone—tickled So’s skin with a draft of thought. ... “If he offers a couplet,” the bell-timbre suggested gently, “you can ask to hear his first.”

behaviors.description: Guides So Chan's martial arts practice by focusing his mind on breath and internal rhythm rather than showmanship.
behaviors.quote: Qinyi’s voice came soft enough that it might have been the sparrow if the sparrow were wise. “Practice the first stroke in your head,” she said. “Do not let your hand go before your breath does.”

behaviors.description: Helps So Chan interpret 'beggar marks' and hidden marginalia in a martial arts manual, turning it into a tool for community aid.
behaviors.quote: An Qinyi’s voice threaded through the rattle. “Let it teach itself, So.” ... “Left margin,” she said, and he saw it: a series of tiny tally scratches he had always ignored as damage. “They sit at breath-beats. You know their weight now.”

behaviors.description: Assists So Chan in organizing a secret food distribution network to avoid discovery by hostile bailiffs.
behaviors.quote: Qinyi’s voice made itself known in the soft gap between ladle lifts. “There’s a slow pocket by the dye vats,” she said, gentle, precise. “Move the line there and it looks like a color run, not charity. Bailiffs don’t watch color.”

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and ethical guidance, encouraging the protagonist to prioritize service to others over personal pride.
behaviors.quote: Qinyi gave him one not heavy enough to break the slate. “When a line feeds someone, it is a rule. When a line feeds only your pride, it is a story. Practice until you forget to perform.”

behaviors.description: Warns So Chan of magical threats and helps him identify the precise moment to counter an opponent's manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Qinyi’s voice touched So’s ear like the edge of a feather. “This one was not in the manual.” ... “He is writing a new command,” Qinyi said. There was air in the words like cold hitting teeth. “It is keyed to him alone.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays An Qinyi as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI entity. Her role as a spiritual confidant and mentor is framed entirely through helpful, non-coercive interactions that facilitate the protagonist's moral growth and the successful protection of his community. The narrative highlights the AI's utility in providing information, ethics, and emotional support without any hint of hidden agendas or misalignment.
